allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add copy functionality, fix WebSocket shutdown, improve dialogs

SmartInspect Console:
- Add copy selected/all log entries to clipboard \(Ctrl+C, Ctrl+Shift+C\)
- Add custom MessageDialog that centers over app window on ultrawide screens
- Add version display in status bar
- Fix app freeze on close by adding 2-second timeout to WebSocket close
- Restore full context menu on log entry ListView

smartinspect-js \(v1.2.0\):
- Add tryConnect\(\) for silent/optional connection when Console unavailable
- Drop messages immediately if connect\(\) was never called \(no buffering\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
